name: Flirt
description:
Whatever your preference you can meet someone special today and Flirt your pants off.

This tongue in cheek dating game pairs you up with random people as you do your best to win their hearts.
Create the perfect character that represents you from hundreds of options to create hilarious scenarios.

See how much love you can get from strangers as your Love count grows or decreases depending on how easy you are with your heart.

Good Luck getting lucky
